EmailTemplate.description: Email sent when public uses Forgot Password option on Login page
EmailTemplate.name: MLF Vol Portal Forgot Password
EmailTemplate.subject: Mobile Loaves & Fishes: Volunteer Portal account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
We received your Forgot Password request.
Click the link below to establish a new password on your Volunteer Portal account. After establishing a new password you will be automatically logged in to your account.
{!Community_Url}
If you did not make a Forgot Password request then please reply to this email to make us aware of the situation.
Thank You! Mobile Loaves & Fishes
